### MachineInstrBuilder() {#a54b0e0d732ea36290a9b6ed6c9960836}

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder">MachineInstrBuilder</a> for manipulating an existing instruction.

F must be the machine function that was used to allocate I.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbuilder-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbuilder-h">MachineInstrBuilder.h</a>.
